title: Emotion → Poem
tagline: With your consent, we analyze your facial expression and craft a short poem to match.
privacyBody: Images are sent to the backend only for real-time inference and are not stored. Disable your camera at any time.

start.q1: Do you want me to monitor your emotions in real time, until you turn me off?
start.q2: Or do you prefer to know only how you feel currently (in the present moment)?
start.realTimeYes: Ok, I’ll stay with you until you decide to turn me off.
start.oneTimeYes: Alright, one reading only. You can ask me again whenever you require.
start.final: Ok… I’ll try to be as empathetic as my programming allows.
